name: Office Escape (itch) (gnitsaf)
description:
Cowboy's Jam Entry - An endless runner.  You're an office worker trapped in your office building, running from zombies and avoiding the debris left behind by your coworkers. 

The jam was 7 days... I only started working on this last night.(less than 24 hours before the deadline). Forgive, I had work.  I may update this next week. I really enjoyed working on the project and there's a few bits of polish I would like to put on it.

While I love working in pygame, I did this one in Gamemaker Studio.


Credits to those who contributed via public licenses of some sort.  Attribution.

credit for player models - https://www.deviantart.com/lostchild14000

credit for office noise - qubodup Copyright 2013 Iwan Gabovitch, CC-BY3 license

credit for some of the icons - https://mysteryattic.itch.io/30-ui-icons

music from royalty free music

sounds from various - 

burb zombie - https://freesound.org/people/EricsSoundschmiede/sounds/463721/
zombie growl - https://freesound.org/people/Under7dude/sounds/163439/
zombie gargles - https://freesound.org/people/Breviceps/sounds/445983/
zombie breathing - https://freesound.org/people/Huminaatio/sounds/189281/
